keyMoments.title: Luffy vs Magellan - Final Showdown
keyMoments.description: Luffy confronts Magellan in a desperate battle despite being heavily poisoned, refusing to give up on reaching Ace.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's unwavering determination to save his brother at any cost.
keyMoments.quote: I'm going to save Ace no matter what!

keyMoments.title: Gear Second Against Magellan
keyMoments.description: Luffy activates Gear Second in an attempt to defeat Magellan with enhanced speed and power.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that even Luffy's enhanced abilities are insufficient against Magellan's overwhelming poison.

keyMoments.title: Gomu Gomu no Jet Twin Pistol
keyMoments.description: Luffy unleashes a powerful dual-handed Jet Pistol attack using Gear Second.
keyMoments.significance: Represents Luffy's most powerful attack in this battle, but still proves insufficient.
keyMoments.quote: Gomu Gomu no... Jet Twin Pistol!

keyMoments.title: Luffy's Complete Defeat
keyMoments.description: Luffy collapses completely covered in Magellan's deadly poison, facing certain death within 24 hours.
keyMoments.significance: Marks one of Luffy's most devastating and complete defeats in the entire series, emphasizing the stakes and his desperate situation.

abilities.abilityName: Gomu Gomu no Jet Twin Pistol
abilities.description: Using Gear Second, Luffy stretches both arms back and launches a dual-handed powerful punch attack.

reveals.information: Can use Jet Twin Pistol - a dual-handed version of Jet Pistol
Even with Gear Second, Luffy cannot overcome Magellan's poison abilities

keyMoments.title: Venom Blowfish (Doku Fugu)
keyMoments.description: Magellan shoots a concentrated poison ball from his mouth as a ranged attack.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the versatility of Magellan's poison abilities beyond close-range combat.

keyMoments.title: Hydra Poison Attack
keyMoments.description: Magellan summons a massive dragon-like formation of poison that completely engulfs Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: One of Magellan's most powerful techniques, ultimately responsible for Luffy's defeat.

keyMoments.title: Venom Cloud
keyMoments.description: Magellan creates a poisonous fog that disorients opponents and attacks their nervous system.
keyMoments.significance: Shows another application of Magellan's poison that attacks the senses and gradually weakens opponents.

keyMoments.title: Complete Victory Over Luffy
keyMoments.description: Magellan completely defeats Luffy, covering him in deadly poison and declaring he will die in 24 hours.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Magellan as one of the few arc antagonists that Luffy never defeats in direct combat.
keyMoments.quote: There is no way to neutralize the amount of poison you've absorbed. For 24 hours you will agonize, and then you'll descend into the real Hell.

abilities.description: Magellan shoots a concentrated poison ball from his mouth as a ranged projectile attack.
Magellan breathes out poisonous gas creating a fog-like cover that disorients and weakens opponents by attacking their nervous system.
Magellan creates a massive dragon-like poison formation that can engulf opponents completely.

reveals.information: Can create Venom Blowfish - a ranged poison projectile
Can create Venom Cloud - a poisonous fog that attacks the nervous system
Can summon Hydra - a massive dragon-like poison formation

keyMoments.title: Declaration of Friendship
keyMoments.description: Bentham passionately declares that Buggy and Galdino are friends worth saving, stating that friendship needs no other reason.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases Bentham's character growth and establishes the friendship theme central to the Impel Down arc.
keyMoments.quote: They are friends! We need no further reason!

relationships.description: Bentham considers Luffy a precious friend and risks everything to help save him.

evolutionMoments.description: Bentham plans to rescue Luffy from Level 5 after his defeat by Magellan.

relationships.description: Bentham declares Buggy as a friend worth saving.

evolutionMoments.description: Bentham saves Buggy from Hannyabal and declares him a friend.

relationships.description: Bentham declares Galdino (Mr. 3) as a friend worth saving.

evolutionMoments.description: Bentham saves Galdino from Hannyabal and declares him a friend.

reveals.information: Values friendship above all else and is willing to risk his life for his friends

name.japanese: ポートガス・D・エース

keyMoments.title: Ace Hears Luffy's Voice
keyMoments.description: From his cell in Level 6, Ace raises his head as he hears Luffy's agonized cries echoing through Impel Down.
keyMoments.significance: Emphasizes the bond between the brothers and Ace's helplessness in his current imprisoned situation.
